settings.title: Our story
settings.description: Combine imagery with text to create stand-out campaign sections, eye-catching promotions, information blocks and more.

settings.heading: OUR STORY
settings.text:
Born and raised in Hawai’i, the ocean was always our escape from reality. And just a few minutes from home lied our specific place of refuge, our favorite spot, a familiar zone above an aquarium reef where the every day stress melted away.  That location and a rising swell was the day things aligned. 


I was just staring at a mountain in the distance, the one they call “Black Mountain”. I didn’t think anything more or anything less about it, just admiring its beauty, a rainbow arching over it like a crown, and wondering how long the rain on its summit would take to fall on us. Not much better than surfing in heavy rain. 


That’s when it happened - “Black Mountains!” my friend at the peak yelled. Startled out of my day dream I looked to see dark Himalayas peaking a hundred yards out. I whipped my board around and B-lined towards the unknown after him, hoping I might get one before one got me. But those two words stayed with me. 


The relationship between the “sleeping giants” on land and the ones that appear from the deep blue were too powerful to ignore. Black Mountain Surf Wax was born. 


Whether it’s a life changing slide or even just the daily re-center, we hope you get it on this thin layer of high-quality sticky stuff we conjured up for you. Whether it’s half way across the world, or just at that special zone where you find happiness just a few minutes from home, we hope you find  Black Mountains.


Ua nāna aku kākou i ka hālāwai. ʻIke wale i na mauna ʻeleʻele. 


We looked to the horizon. All we saw were black mountains.

settings.title: SAME SHIT, DIFFERENT GENERATION
settings.description: I was born and raised on the east side of O’ahu. All I really did was Surf, Skate, and do Jiu Jitsu back then. To be honest, that’s all I really do now. I met my wife from Kaua’i where we both went to college in Santa Barbara and we decided to move back home to raise our kids so they could grow up the same way we did.

settings.title: A NEW PATH. ONE BAR TO ANOTHER.
settings.description:
I chased my Jiu Jitsu dreams out of college, turning a school project into a martial arts Soap business that I still run today…but somehow, something was still missing. 

Between the frigid west coast point breaks and the warm tropical waves in Hawai’i, one thing remained the same, the sticky stuff beneath my feet, and for whatever reason, a new brand of wax was always something that captivated me. I collected them all - the Australian bars, the super tacky Brazilian formulas, and of course the American classics. 

But about 2 years ago, I decided my growing beanstalk of wax was missing its most important bar - my own.
